name: 鄭以旋
objective: This course is designed to strengthen students' English proficiency in basic grammar and sentence patterns, facilitate the improvement of reading skills and writing skills (the latter in the form of writing workshops), and to enhance their competence in listening and speaking.

scorePolicy:
Attendance policy:
Eight or more absences from Week 2 onwards will result in a grade of 0% for the course.   

Assessment:
Group presentation (speaking)　　　　20%
School Mid-term　　　　　　　　20%
Writing test*　　　　　　　　　　10%　　　　
Final exam* (reading and listening)　　　　40%
Attendance and participation　　　　10%　　　　

* At the lecturer’s sole discretion, a make-up Writing Test or Final Exam may be granted upon presentation of a valid proof of illness (medical certificate or record of hospitalization) within 10 days of the date of absence.
